comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Probably a rear view. But where was this building?

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Wystan: This is Woodrow Wilson's summer home in Sea Girt, New Jersey. There is a LC image with Wilson standing on the porch steps at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3b07163.
